prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A young woman wearing a bright orange ski jacket and a fluffy white Red Bull beanie stands outdoors on a podium, smiling broadly with an expressive open mouth as she speaks loudly and animatedly. Her long blonde hair flows gently over her shoulders. She holds a plush panda toy in one gloved hand and a bouquet of flowers alongside a snowboard in the other. A large gold medal hangs around her neck, resting against her chest. The background features a vibrant blue banner with white Chinese characters and arrow graphics, suggesting a competitive winter sports event under clear daylight. Soft natural lighting highlights her cheerful expression and the vivid colors of her outfit. She begins by turning her head fully to face forward, then smoothly shifts her gaze to the side while continuing to speak with lively lip movement, before returning her head to the front again. Her hands move gently as she gestures slightly with the plush toy and adjusts the bouquet, adding rhythm to her speech. Her posture remains relaxed yet engaged, conveying confidence and joy. The camera stays steady at eye level, capturing her upper body and fluid motions as she shares her moment with warmth and energy.
negative_prompt: FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering, abrupt cuts, and unnatural scene transitions. A deformed, disfigured figure without coherent features, rendered as a low-quality, unrealistic 3D animation with cartoonish exaggeration and abstract distortion. The young woman’s face is grotesquely warped: her mouth remains frozen in a rigid, unchanging grimace with misaligned, crooked teeth; deep, unnatural wrinkles carve across her cheeks and forehead; her eyes are dull and lifeless, lacking sparkle or expression. Her long blonde hair appears clumped, frayed, and static, defying physics. Her hands are twisted, fragmented, and trembling violently — fingers fused or missing, gloves melting into the bouquet and mascot she holds. The plush mascot and roses are pixelated and malformed, merging unnaturally with the snowboard, whose decorative patterns bleed into glitchy artifacts. Her silver medal and ANTA neck gaiter are smeared with digital noise, logos warped and unreadable. The background collapses into a chaotic collage of grainy textures, striped interference patterns, and illegible Chinese characters — no clear venue, no directional arrows, only visual noise. Lighting is harsh, inconsistent, and over-saturated — casting jagged shadows and blown-out highlights that flicker erratically. Her posture is stiff and broken; any attempt at gesture results in jerky, spasmodic twitches. The camera shakes violently, zooms unpredictably, and shifts framing erratically — capturing fragmented body parts, skewed angles, and sudden blackouts. No fluid motion, no warmth, no joy — only glitched, corrupted, and degraded imagery with extreme contrast, hyper-sharp edges, and pervasive grain.

video_name: 常规情况_葛优_2_英文_稍快节奏_年轻女生_11.mp4
prompt:
FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A bald man wearing a black leather jacket sits indoors, his expression thoughtful and composed as he prepares to speak with quiet intensity. The scene shows a middle-aged East Asian man with smooth, clean-shaven scalp and calm dark eyes. He wears a simple black zippered jacket, its texture slightly glossy under soft lighting. His posture is relaxed yet engaged, one hand gently cradling his jaw while the other rests lightly on his lap. 

The background features a softly blurred indoor space with warm ambient tones, suggesting a quiet room or studio setting. Diffused natural light filters in from the side, casting gentle shadows that highlight the contours of his face without harshness. 

He begins by turning his head slowly to face forward, then shifts it smoothly to the side as if considering his words, before returning his gaze to the front with deliberate calm. As he speaks, his mouth opens with expressive ease, lips moving fluidly to shape each syllable with clarity and presence. His voice carries a measured tone, neither rushed nor hesitant, accompanied by subtle hand gestures — fingers occasionally lifting in gentle emphasis, palms turning slightly upward as if inviting reflection. 

His shoulders remain relaxed, his upper body leaning just slightly forward to convey attentiveness. There is no tension in his movement; every gesture flows naturally, reinforcing the sincerity of his speech. The camera holds steady at eye level, capturing his upper torso and facial expressions with quiet precision, allowing the viewer to feel the depth of his thought and the grace of his delivery. The overall mood is contemplative, grounded, and deeply human.
negative_prompt:
FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, suffering from severe stuttering and abrupt scene cuts. A bald man wearing a black leather jacket appears as a deformed, disfigured, computer-generated figure — his face warped, skin texture broken, with deep, unnatural wrinkles and misaligned, crooked teeth visible even when his mouth remains frozen shut. His expression is僵硬 and lifeless, eyes dull and asymmetrical, lacking any thoughtfulness or composure. His hand, cradling his jaw, is grotesquely twisted, fingers shattered and trembling violently, while the other hand spasms erratically on his lap. 

The background is a chaotic collage of grainy textures, striped patterns, and flickering artifacts, devoid of spatial coherence or ambient warmth. Lighting is harsh, inconsistent, and unnaturally saturated — casting jagged shadows that fracture across his face, creating extreme contrast and visual noise. No natural diffusion; instead, glaring highlights and crushed blacks dominate.

He attempts to turn his head, but motion is glitched — snapping violently sideways then back, no smooth transition, only stuttering jerks. His lips remain rigidly fixed, never opening or moving to form words, despite implied speech. Any attempt at gesture results in fragmented, twitching limbs — palms contorted into unnatural angles, fingers dissolving into pixelated shards. Shoulders lock in place or twitch uncontrollably, body leaning forward not with attentiveness, but with mechanical spasms.

Camera work is disjointed: sudden zooms, erratic pans, and unstructured framing that cuts off parts of his face or torso mid-motion. Composition collapses into chaos — logos and text overlays flash intermittently, corrupting the image. Overall style is low-resolution, heavily compressed, cartoonish 3D animation with extreme sharpness that amplifies artifacts, grain, and distortion. The mood is jarring, artificial, and emotionally vacant — a broken simulation of humanity, not its grace.
